trans-unit.source: Represents the coordinates of a three-dimensional (3D) data point.
trans-unit.target: Representa as coordenadas de um ponto de dados 3D (tridimensional).

trans-unit.source: This class is used when performing custom drawing with 3D charts.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe é usada ao executar um desenho personalizado com gráficos 3D.

trans-unit.source: Any point used in custom 3D drawing—which is accomplished using GDI+—must be transformed from relative X, Y and Z (3D) coordinates into relative X and Y (2D) coordinates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.TransformPoints%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Qualquer ponto usado no desenho 3D personalizado — que é realizado usando GDI+ — deve ser transformada do relativo X, Y e Z (3D) coordenadas relativa X e Y (2D) coordena usando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.TransformPoints%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: By calling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.TransformPoints%2A>, the X and Y-values of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Point3D> objects are changed so that they reflect the 3-dimensional space.
trans-unit.target: Chamando <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.TransformPoints%2A>, os X e valores de Y de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Point3D> objetos são alterados para que reflitam o espaço de 3-dimensional.

trans-unit.source: The new X and Y points can then be used for GDI+ method calls—the Z value is then disregarded—after being changed to absolute pixel coordinates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartGraphics.GetAbsolutePoint%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Novo X e Y pontos, em seguida, podem ser usados para chamadas de método GDI+ — o valor de Z, em seguida, é desconsiderado — depois de alterado para coordenadas de pixel absoluto usando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartGraphics.GetAbsolutePoint%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Note that the Z coordinate may be less than zero (located behind a chart area) or greater than 100 (located in front of a chart area).
trans-unit.target: Observe que a coordenada Z pode ser menor que zero (localizado atrás de uma área do gráfico) ou maior que 100 (localizado na frente de uma área do gráfico).

trans-unit.source: To both enable 3D charts and work with their styles, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Area3DStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para habilitar gráficos 3D e trabalhar com seus estilos, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Area3DStyle%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Point3D> class is not used for 3D styles.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Point3D> classe não é usada para os estilos 3D.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Point3D" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Point3D" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Point3D" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Point3D" />.

trans-unit.source: The X coordinate of 3D point.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada X do ponto 3D.

trans-unit.source: The Y coordinate of 3D point.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada Y do ponto 3D.

trans-unit.source: The Z coordinate, which represents the depth of 3D point.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada Z, que representa a profundidade do ponto 3D.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationPathPoint" /> class with the specified X, Y and Z coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationPathPoint" /> com as coordenadas X, Y e Z especificadas.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> structure, which stores the X and Y coordinates of a 3D point.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define uma estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />, que armazena as coordenadas X e Y de um ponto 3D.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> structure which stores the X and Y coordinates of a 3D point.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> estrutura que armazena as coordenadas X e Y de um ponto de 3D.

trans-unit.source: Any point used in custom 3D drawing—which is accomplished using GDI+—must be transformed from X, Y and Z (3D) coordinates into X and Y (2D) coordinates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.TransformPoints%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Qualquer ponto usado no desenho 3D personalizado — que é realizado usando GDI+ — devem ser transformados de X, Y e Z (3D) coordena em X e Y (2D) coordena usando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.TransformPoints%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: This method takes an array of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Point3D> objects as its only parameter.
trans-unit.target: Esse método usa uma matriz de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Point3D> objetos como seu único parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: By calling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.TransformPoints%2A>, the X and Y property values are changed to reflect the 3-dimensional space.
trans-unit.target: Chamando <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.TransformPoints%2A>, os valores de propriedade X e Y são alterados para refletir o espaço de 3-dimensional.

trans-unit.source: These new X and Y coordinates are then converted to absolute coordinates, by using a method such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartGraphics.GetAbsolutePoint%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Esses novos coordenadas X e Y são então convertidos em absoluto coordenadas, usando um método, como o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartGraphics.GetAbsolutePoint%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: After converting the coordinates, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Point3D.PointF%2A> property of each Point3D object can be used for any GDI+ method that take a <xref:System.Drawing.PointF> object as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: Depois de converter as coordenadas de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Point3D.PointF%2A> propriedade de cada objeto Point3D pode ser usada para qualquer método GDI+ levar uma <xref:System.Drawing.PointF> objeto como um parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the X coordinate of a 3D point.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a coordenada X de um ponto 3D.

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="float" /> that represents the X coordinate of a 3D point.
trans-unit.target: Um <see langword="float" /> que representa a coordenada X do ponto de 3D.

trans-unit.source: Any point used in custom 3D drawing—which is accomplished using GDI+—must be transformed from X, Y and Z (3D) coordinates into X and Y (2D) coordinates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.TransformPoints%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Qualquer ponto usado no desenho 3D personalizado — que é realizado usando GDI+ — devem ser transformados de X, Y e Z (3D) coordena em X e Y (2D) coordena usando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.TransformPoints%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: This method takes an array of Point3D objects as its only parameter.
trans-unit.target: Esse método usa uma matriz de objetos Point3D como seu único parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: By calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.TransformPoints%2A> method, the X and Y property values are changed to reflect the 3-dimensional space.
trans-unit.target: Chamando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.TransformPoints%2A> método, os valores de propriedade X e Y são alterados para refletir o espaço de 3-dimensional.

trans-unit.source: These new X and Y coordinates are then converted to absolute coordinates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartGraphics.GetAbsolutePoint%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Esses novos X e Y coordenadas são então convertidos em absoluto coordenadas usando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartGraphics.GetAbsolutePoint%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: They are then used for GDI+ method calls.
trans-unit.target: Eles são usados para chamadas de método GDI+.

trans-unit.source: A relative X coordinate can be obtained from an axis value by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.ValueToPosition%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Relativo coordenada X pode ser obtida de um valor do eixo ao chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.ValueToPosition%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Y coordinate of a 3D point.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a coordenada Y de um ponto 3D.

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="float" /> value that represents the Y coordinate of a 3D point.
trans-unit.target: Um <see langword="float" /> valor que representa a coordenada Y do ponto de 3D.

trans-unit.source: Any point used in custom 3D drawing—which is accomplished using GDI+—must be transformed from X, Y and Z (3D) coordinates into X and Y (2D) coordinates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.TransformPoints%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Qualquer ponto usado no desenho 3D personalizado — que é realizado usando GDI+ — devem ser transformados de X, Y e Z (3D) coordena em X e Y (2D) coordena usando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.TransformPoints%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: This method takes an array of Point3D objects as its only parameter.
trans-unit.target: Esse método usa uma matriz de objetos Point3D como seu único parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: By calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.TransformPoints%2A> method, the X and Y property values are changed to reflect the 3-dimensional space.
trans-unit.target: Chamando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.TransformPoints%2A> método, os valores de propriedade X e Y são alterados para refletir o espaço de 3-dimensional.

trans-unit.source: These new X and Y coordinates are then converted to absolute coordinates by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartGraphics.GetAbsolutePoint%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Esses novos coordenadas X e Y são então convertidos em absoluto coordenadas usando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartGraphics.GetAbsolutePoint%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: They are then used for GDI+ method calls.
trans-unit.target: Eles são usados para chamadas de método GDI+.

trans-unit.source: A relative Y coordinate can be obtained from an axis value using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.ValueToPosition%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Uma coordenada Y relativa pode ser obtida de um valor de eixo usando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.ValueToPosition%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Z coordinate of a 3D point.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a coordenada Z de um ponto 3D.

trans-unit.source: The Z coordinate of a 3D point, which is measured as a percentage of the relevant chart area's depth.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada Z de um ponto de 3D, medido como uma porcentagem de profundidade da área do gráfico relevantes.

trans-unit.source: This Z property is always expressed as a percentage of the relevant chart area's depth.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade Z sempre é expressa como uma porcentagem de profundidade da área do gráfico relevantes.

trans-unit.source: With 3D charts, Z coordinates are relative, and have a value of 0 for the back wall of the chart area and a value of 100 for the front wall of the chart area.
trans-unit.target: Com gráficos 3D, Z coordenadas são relativas e tem um valor de 0 a parede traseira da área do gráfico e um valor de 100 para a front parede da área do gráfico.

trans-unit.source: **Note** This Z property may be less than zero (located behind a chart area) or greater than 100 (located in front of a chart area).
trans-unit.target: **Observação** propriedade Z este pode ser menor que zero (localizado atrás de uma área do gráfico) ou maior que 100 (localizado na frente de uma área do gráfico).

trans-unit.source: Any point used in custom 3D drawing—which is accomplished using GDI+—must be transformed from X, Y and Z (3D) coordinates into X and Y (2D) coordinates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.TransformPoints%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Qualquer ponto usado no desenho 3D personalizado — que é realizado usando GDI+ — devem ser transformados de X, Y e Z (3D) coordena em X e Y (2D) coordena usando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.TransformPoints%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: This method takes an array of Point3D objects as its only parameter.
trans-unit.target: Esse método usa uma matriz de objetos Point3D como seu único parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: By calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.TransformPoints%2A> method, the X and Y property values are changed to reflect the 3-dimensional space.
trans-unit.target: Chamando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.TransformPoints%2A> método, os valores de propriedade X e Y são alterados para refletir o espaço de 3-dimensional.

trans-unit.source: These new X and Y coordinates are then converted to absolute coordinates by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartGraphics.GetAbsolutePoint%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Esses novos coordenadas X e Y são então convertidos em absoluto coordenadas usando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartGraphics.GetAbsolutePoint%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: They are then used for GDI+ method calls.
trans-unit.target: Eles são usados para chamadas de método GDI+.

trans-unit.source: Relative Z coordinates can be obtained for series by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.GetSeriesDepth%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.GetSeriesZPosition%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Coordenadas relativas de Z podem ser obtidas para a série usando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.GetSeriesDepth%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.GetSeriesZPosition%2A> métodos.
